front.div:
ABSTRACT
DRM offers an efficient way to protect digital contents. However,
existing general DRM systems cannot be directly applied to low
computation-power systems such as Media cards. We propose an
implementation of a DRM system which is applicable to such
limited environments by analyzing the main specifications and
modifying key aspects of the cryptographic algorithms.
